titleStmt.title: The new courtier: the tune is, Cloris, since thou art fled away, &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, J. Wright, J. Clarke, W. Thackeray, and T. Passinger.,

notesStmt.note: Date and place of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "Upon the change where merchants meet ..."
